author: arnetheduck
content: speaking of genesis, `GENESIS_FORK_VERSION` seems like a value for mainnet - should we use the same for testnets and should we have it in the spec so strongly (what if I want to launch a private chain?)

author: protolambda
content: Between these spec config values there's definitely varying degrees of ideal flexibility in a client. But breaking up the config, or making every config value super dynamic, doesn't feel right either. Open for suggestions here. And yes, for testnets it's better to use alternative forkversions
